name: Down, Down, Down
description:
Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam! Theme: Deeper and deeper.

Based on the book "Alice's Adventures Under Ground" by Lewis Carroll, "Down, Down, Down" is a Narrative/2D Top Down/Platform game, by which I mean it has a little bit of everything, in which you play as a young girl who fell down a rabbit hole while chasing a white rabbit.

Made with GB Studio.

How to play:
  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
  • Z/J/Alt: A
  • X/K/Ctrl: B
  • Enter: Start
  • Shift: Select
